Hey Mike,
 
I am the only one that I know of that has contacted the family=

member of someone in spirit that I recieved communication from.
 
The spir=
it person was the renowned EVP pioneer Sarah Estep
I recieved contact from =
her within days of her transition.
 
At the time there was a board member h=
ere who was aquainted with
Ms. Estep in life and verified the recognition o=
f her voice. They also 
informed me of her daughter and I was able to get i=
n touch with her.
 
I sent her a CD of all the messages I recieved from her=
 mother and
recieved a letter of thanks and her recognition of some of the =
phrases 
her mother had used in the messages. We still correspond from time=
 to time
But I'm sorry to say I have not recieved any further communication=
 from
Ms. Estep.
 
Bruce
Bruce Halliday
